result.eng: Everybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.orig: Deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an Uachtaráin John F Kennedy
result.html: deir gach éinne a bhí beo i 1963 gur cuimhin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar chuala siad faoi dhúnmharú an uachtaráin john f kennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.
result.ponchtml: deir gaċ éinne a ḃí beo i 1963 gur cuiṁin leo go cruinn ala an ama ar ċuala siad faoi ḋúnṁarú an uaċtaráin john f kennedyEverybody who was alive in 1963 says they remember exactly the point in time when they heard of President John F. Kennedy's assassination.

result.eng: In 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ga: i 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhflorida in éindí le marbhan al-seithí agus siad deara
result.orig: I 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhFlorida in éindí le Marbhan Al-Seithí agus Siad Deara
result.html: i 2000 thosaigh sé ag foghlaim eitilte i bhflorida in éindí le marbhan al-seithí agus siad dearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.
result.ponchtml: i 2000 ṫosaiġ sé ag foġlaim eitilte i ḃflorida in éindí le marḃan al-seiṫí agus siad dearaIn 2000, he started learning to fly in Florida along with Marbhan Al-Seithí and Siad Deara.

result.eng: They carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.
result.ga: rinne siad ionruathar ar an iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin
result.orig: Rinne siad ionruathar ar an Iaráic bliain go leith ina dhiaidh sin

result.ponchtml: rinne siad ionruaṫar ar an iaráic bliain go leiṫ ina ḋiaiḋ sinThey carried out an invasion on Iraq one and half year after that.

result.eng: The waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
result.ga: chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampall
result.orig: Chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampall
result.html: chuir siad cogadh ar arm an rí chun seilbh a fháil ar an teampallThe waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.
result.ponchtml: ċuir siad cogaḋ ar arm an rí ċun seilḃ a ḟáil ar an teampallThe waged war on the king's army to acquire the temple.

result.eng: They would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ga: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.orig: Is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraige
result.html: is minic a shuíodh siad ina mbeirt ar bhruach na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.
result.ponchtml: is minic a ẛuíoḋ siad ina mbeirt ar ḃruaċ na farraigeThey would often sit, the two of them, on the bank of the sea.

result.eng: They are all among the dead.
result.ga: tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbh
result.orig: Tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbh
result.html: tá siad uilig ar shlua na marbhThey are all among the dead.
result.ponchtml: tá siad uilig ar ẛlua na marḃThey are all among the dead.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar ẛeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.eng: They were waiting for their turn.
result.ga: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.orig: Bhí siad ag feitheamh lena seal
result.html: bhí siad ag feitheamh lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag feiṫeaṁ lena sealThey were waiting for their turn.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: Ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: They decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ga: rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.orig: Rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidin
result.html: rinne siad amach fanacht ar an talamh tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.
result.ponchtml: rinne siad amaċ fanaċt ar an talaṁ tirim go maidinThey decided to stay on dry land till morning.

result.eng: They will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ga: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.orig: Ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile é
result.html: ní chreidfidh siad a dhath mura mothaí siad lena lámha é agus mura bhfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.
result.ponchtml: ní ċreidfiḋ siad a ḋaṫ mura moṫaí siad lena láṁa é agus mura ḃfeice siad lena súile éThey will not believe anything they cannot feel with their hands and see with their eyes.

result.eng: They were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ga: bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach níorbh é sin do shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.orig: Bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach Níorbh é sin do Shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gasta
result.html: bhí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostach níorbh é sin do shéimí é bhí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad ag siúl leo go brúite tostaċ níorḃ é sin do ẛéimí é ḃí sé óg lúfar gastaThey were walking quietly and tiredly. But not Jamie: he was young, fit and quick.

result.eng: It doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ga: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.orig: Is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astu
result.html: is cuma dá mbíodh siad ag magadh ort go dtiteadh an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.
result.ponchtml: is cuma dá mbíoḋ siad ag magaḋ ort go dtiteaḋ an cár astuIt doesn't matter if they mock you until their teeth fall out.

result.eng: They gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ga: thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.orig: Thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainne
result.html: thug siad scoil agus léann domh ar feadh a n-acmhainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.
result.ponchtml: ṫug siad scoil agus léann doṁ ar feaḋ a n-acṁainneThey gave me as much education as they could afford.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: Thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.

result.eng: They were a day's walk from the place.
result.ga: bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.orig: Bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áit
result.html: bhí siad fá shiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.
result.ponchtml: ḃí siad fá ẛiúl lae don áitThey were a day's walk from the place.
